name: PC Support Group
description: IT support services across the UK
overview:
Whether you have a one-off IT support issue or you require on-going computer maintenance, we can help.

Our fully managed IT support service even helps prevent problems before they occur, saving you time and money. Our advanced remote IT support technology enables us to potentially resolve your computer problems within minutes or we can provide face to face help and advice from one of our many offices throughout the UK.

Using The PC Support Group is like having your own dedicated IT support department ready to help at any time, but without the usual associated high costs.

offices.address1: Liverpool Business Centre 23 Goodlass Road Merseyside
